loc2.description: The ice bridge begins to crack. Pass a Luck (-1) check or fall into the icy depths. If you fall, you are lost in time and space.
loc2.name: the dreamlands

loc1.description: The stone arch breaks! Pass a Speed (-1) check to dive out of the way or roll a die and lose that much Stamina.
loc1.name: abyss

other.description: The humidity and heat is exhausting. Lose 1 Stamina.
